data.message: Fix gate_tool to use computed risk enum and structured allowed_via_token: Computed risk FIRST outside try block (fail-closed if classification fails), used is_risky = risk in (DESTRUCTIVE, CRITICAL) instead of is_destructive flag, used result.allowed_via_token structured field instead of string matching reason. Pushed to duro-mcp repo.
data.task: Fix gate_tool to use computed risk enum and structured allowed_via_token
data.outcome: Computed risk FIRST outside try block (fail-closed if classification fails), used is_risky = risk in (DESTRUCTIVE, CRITICAL) instead of is_destructive flag, used result.allowed_via_token structured field instead of string matching reason. Pushed to duro-mcp repo.
